decoworld.model.world.combat

Interface WorldController


  • public interface WorldController
    A non completed interface for objects that control decoworld.model (model) and decoworld.gdxmodel (view).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean _isVisible(WorldEntity e, Player p)
      Returns whether the player can see this entity.
      void addEntity(WorldEntity entity)
      Add an entity to physics and the world.
      void destroyEntity(WorldEntity entity)
      Remove an entity from physics and the world.
      WorldEntity getEntity(short netId)
      Returns the entity corresponding to a network identifier.
      int getNextEntityId()
      Returns a world unique int identifier
      java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()
      Returns a list of players being handled by the controller.
      WorldControllerType getType()
      Returns the type of controller.
      World getWorld()
      Returns the world that is being controlled by this controller.

    • Method Detail

      • addEntity

        void addEntity(WorldEntity entity)
        Add an entity to physics and the world. This method works with concurrent execution.
        Parameters:
        entity - - the entity to add

      • destroyEntity

        void destroyEntity(WorldEntity entity)
        Remove an entity from physics and the world. This method works with concurrent execution.
        Parameters:
        entity - - the entity to remove

      • getWorld

        World getWorld()
        Returns the world that is being controlled by this controller. Do not add entities directly to the world.
        Returns:
        world - the World instance being controlled

      • getNextEntityId

        int getNextEntityId()
        Returns a world unique int identifier
        Returns:
        - id

      • getType

        WorldControllerType getType()
        Returns the type of controller. See the WorldControllerType enum for a list of valid values.
        Returns:
        type - the type of controller

      • getPlayers

        java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()
        Returns a list of players being handled by the controller.
        Returns:
        players - a list of player entities

      • getEntity

        WorldEntity getEntity(short netId)
        Returns the entity corresponding to a network identifier. If no entity exists, returns null
        Parameters:
        netId - - the network identifier
        Returns:
        entity

      • _isVisible

        boolean _isVisible(WorldEntity e,
                 Player p)
        Returns whether the player can see this entity.
        Parameters:
        e - - the entity
        p - - the player
        Returns:
